title: Looking for Plat + adc
body:
plat 5 support only, looking for competent ADC peaked p3 this season. 
not limited to the supps i can play, currently maining Janna Lulu.
legit player here always looking to improve 
easy going, but focused on winning will play the meta to win games
add this acc if interested which is my Smurf and ill get back to you on my main
currently playing around 4 hours per day
GL and HF summoners
